question_text:
Question 43
                          
 
 
The Von-Mises stress at a point in a body subjected to forces is proportional to the square root of the
Machine Design (Theory of Failure) 
 
(A) plastic strain energy per unit voume 
 
(B) distortional strain energy per unit voume  
 
 
(C) total strain energy per unit voume  
 
(D) dilatational strain energy per unit voume 
Ans. 
B 
Sol.
 
Von-Mises stress is proportional to square root of distortion strain energy. 
 
 
Hence, the correct option is (B).
